info.title: PDF4me Word
info.description: Enhance your workflows with the powerful capabilities of the PDF4me Word Connector. Comprehensive features for creating and manipulating Word file formats. Seamlessly integrate advanced Microsoft Word, and more to drive better efficiency and intelligence across your processes.

Extract metadata and properties from Word documents - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/word/extract-metadata
Merge multiple Word documents into a single file with formatting preservation - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/word/merge-documents
Optimize Word documents for size and performance with various options - https://docs.pdf4me.com/integrations/power-automate/word/optimize-document
